// components/About.js import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const About = () => { const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { y: 30, opacity: 0 }, visible: { y: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: "easeOut" } } }; const stats = [ { number: "5+", label: "Projects Completed", icon: "fas fa-project-diagram" }, { number: "2+", label: "Years Experience", icon: "fas fa-calendar-alt" }, { number: "10+", label: "Technologies", icon: "fas fa-code" }, { number: "2", label: "Research Papers", icon: "fas fa-file-alt" } ]; return (

About Me

Get to know me better
{/* Main content grid */}
{/* About Text */} {/* Introduction */}

Who I Am

I'm a passionate Data Scientist and{' '} Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in developing AI-powered solutions. My journey in tech began with a curiosity about how data can drive meaningful insights and innovations. {/* Education & Experience */}

Education & Expertise

Currently pursuing my Master's in Data Science, I have hands-on experience in building end-to-end machine learning pipelines, from data preprocessing to model deployment. I'm particularly interested in natural language processing, computer vision, and their applications in real-world scenarios. {/* Personal Interests */}

Beyond Code

When I'm not coding or analyzing data, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge through technical writing and mentoring aspiring data scientists. {/* Skills highlights */}

Core Technologies

{[ { name: 'Python', icon: 'fab fa-python' }, { name: 'Machine Learning', icon: 'fas fa-brain' }, { name: 'Deep Learning', icon: 'fas fa-network-wired' }, { name: 'React', icon: 'fab fa-react' }, { name: 'AWS', icon: 'fab fa-aws' } ].map((skill, index) => ( {skill.name} ))} {/* Letter of Recommendation */} {/* Background decoration */}
{/* Header */}

Letter of Recommendation

From CEO, Gen Idea Technologies

 {/* Quote */} "The candidate demonstrated strong technical competence in machine learning concepts, along with a clear ability to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world use cases. Their commitment to continuous learning, problem-solving mindset, and analytical approach were consistently evident." {/* Recommendation Details */}

Internship Completion Certificate

Summer 2024

Performance
Good
Project: "Optimizing IoT Systems: Machine Learning for Predictive Maintenance"
Supervisor: Dr. Muralidhar Kurni, IEEE Member
Organization: Gen Idea Technologies
{/* Signature */}
Recommended by
Dr. Muralidhar Kurni
IEEE Member
{/* Stats Grid */} {stats.map((stat, index) => ( {stat.number}
{stat.label}
 ))}
{/* Call to action */} Explore My Journey
); }; export default About;
